Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
org.tum.opensim.somview 1.0
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.tum.opensim.somview

Interface Summary
UMatrixObserver Simple interface defining an observer for the umatrix
 

Class Summary
ColorChooserEditor  
ColorRenderer Table cell renderer that renders a cell with a specified color
ComboStrokeRenderer Renderer for listelements that displays basic strokes (@BasicStroke)
ContourLineControls Panel that contains elements to control the contour lines in the umatrix
DistanceHexagon Distance hexagon class - corresponds to the distance between two neighboring nodes in the SOM
Hexagon Hexagon superclass - will be inherited by node hexagon and distance hexagon.
HexagonFactory Factory class that produces hexagons
HexagonInterpolationPaint Paint class Just needs to be set as paint for a @see Graphics2D and the hexagons will be drawn in an interpolated, smoothed fashion (with contourlines) This way, the map stays the same size and the user can easily switch between interpolated and non-interpolated
HexagonInterpolationPaintContext Paintcontext that draws hexagons in an interpolated fashion
HexagonInterpolationPaintContext.PointAndColor Only contains a point, a color and some double value (struct like use)
NodeHexagon A NodeHexagon is a Hexagon object that represents a node in the SOM.
ProgressEvent  
SOMMap  
SOMTrajectory Class the represents a trajectory that can be drawn ontop of the umatrix
SOMView Viewer for SOMs that combines umatrix display with control elements
SOMViewAction Action element that can be a part of a menu in opensim In this case, it will be part of the "windows" menu
StrokeLabel Label that displays a stroke
StrokeTableCellRenderer Table cell renderer that uses the @see StrokeLabel to display strokes
StyleLine Contains some predefined strokes
TrajectoryTableModel Table model for the table that contains information and options for the loaded trajectories
UMatrix The UMatrix is a JPanel that shows a umatrix.
 

Exception Summary
SOMReadException Exception that is thrown if an error occures when reading a SOM from file
